transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Very good afternoon sir. Regrow India mein baat ho rahi hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Main Shaltanya baat kar rahi hu sir, IndiaMART ke account mein sir. Actually last time mere aapse discussion hua tha IndiaMART se sir aapke account mein sir. IndiaMART ki services chal rahi hai na sir. Actually last time mera aapse discussion hua tha sir. Aapne bataya tha ki aapka dealing area Assam, Jharkhand and West Bengal. Inhi area mein aap deal karte hain.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: So, maine aapka location preference bhi jo hai yaha pe set karaya tha and then phir abhi aapke location preference ke according leads bhi generate honi start ho gayi hai. So, abhi bhi aap sir proper lead pe active nahi hai. So like kya concern aa raha hai sir abhi?
Customer: Main apna manager ka number de raha hu. Thik hai? Woh abhi toh bahar gaya hua hai. Yeh aapka WhatsApp number hai mam?
Executive: Haan haan sir, is number pe WhatsApp bhi hai.
Customer: Haan toh main yeh number usko bhi de de raha hu. Thik hai? Toh woh aapse samajh ke baat karke jo bhi hoga aage ka detailing kar lenge. Thik hai na?
Executive: Thik hai. Thik hai sir, thik hai sir.
Customer: Okay. Thank you.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not active on leads.



Resolution:

- Executive inquired about the reason for inactivity.

- Customer shared manager's number for further discussion.



Next Steps: 

- Manager will connect for further discussion.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, location preference, account, services
